title: [Ta'Vaalor, Shimeraern Var]
description: The cobbled var provides a distant view of the city's airships dock several blocks to the west, the sound of the vessels only occasionally drifting in on a puff of wind.  Raucous laughter pours from the open windows of a tavern on the corner, filling the var with the sounds of merriment.

The cobbled var provides a distant view of the city's airship dock several blocks to the west, the sound of the vessels only occasionally drifting in on a puff of wind.  The murmur of conversation drifts from the tavern as somber-looking patrons come and go, while a couple of young boys scrub at the soot-stained walls with buckets of soapy water.

The cobbled var provides a distant view of the city's airship dock several blocks to the west, the sound of the vessels only occasionally drifting in on a puff of wind.  The murmur of conversation drifts from the tavern as somber-looking patrons come and go.

Shadows flicker across the cobbled var, backlit from the open windows of the tavern on the corner.  Barely seen is A maoral sign set above the door from which music and laughter pour forth.  Guardsmen stand watch a few feet away, keeping a keen eye on drunken revelers as they stumble out and toward their homes.

The cobbled var provides a distant view of the city's airships dock several blocks to the west, the sound of the vessels only occasionally drifting in on a puff of wind.  Music and laughter pour from the open windows of a tavern on the corner, filling the var with the sounds of revelry.  A maoral sign is set above the door of the tavern.
